Janet Stevens

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Jeanette Stevens; Jeannett Stephens
  2. Foster Name: Unknown
  3. Foster Family: J. Parks
  4. Location of Family: Seward, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Seward, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 9
  8. Date of Birth: 6/9/1906, Brooklyn, NY
  9. Date of Death: 3/25/2007, Seward, NE
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Jeanette Ost
  12. Spouse Name: Lester Ost
  13. Source: The Blue Valley Blade, 2 February 1916; 1920 United States Federal Census; Tecumseh Chieftain 15 October 2015; Find-A-Grave for Jeanette Ost.
